keyword: calories in 3 ounces of chicken breast
title: Calories in 3 Ounces of Chicken Breast
meta_description: Learn calories in 3 ounces of chicken breast, plus protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition per serving, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in 3 Ounces of Chicken Breast
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 3 oz â‰ˆ 85 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 3 ounces of cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~140 kcal and ~26 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 3 ounces of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal for skinless, boneless, cooked chicken breast.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 3 ounces of chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw would be higher due to water loss during cooking.

faqs.q: Does adding skin change calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Yes, skin-on adds about 30 kcal per 100 g compared to skinless.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 3 ounces of chicken breast?
faqs.a: Around 3.1 g total fat, with 0.9 g saturated, for skinless cooked.
